body_html: @SsnL It would be nice if matrix_power also supported non-integer powers like 0.5 and other cases. It may though require a full svd approach or some custom Newton-step approximation (saw it in some paper for a fast matrix square root estimation without doing an svd)
body_text: @SsnL It would be nice if matrix_power also supported non-integer powers like 0.5 and other cases. It may though require a full svd approach or some custom Newton-step approximation (saw it in some paper for a fast matrix square root estimation without doing an svd)
body: @SsnL It would be nice if matrix_power also supported non-integer powers like 0.5 and other cases. It may though require a full svd approach or some custom Newton-step approximation (saw it in some paper for a fast matrix square root estimation without doing an svd)
